title: Did the 180-day countdown begin to reveal space objects with the COVID-19 relief bill?
subtitle: The Intelligence Licensing Act has been included in the same draft Comprehensive Expenditure Act as the COVID-19 Relief Bill, which calls for a non-confidential report on foreign items.
author: Bethania Palma
vclaim: In December 2020, a comprehensive federal spending bill was launched, covering 180 days ' countdown from COVID-19 to a non-confidential report on the discovery of foreign objects.
